title: Tech that made my iPhone Better
description: Save 20% off Mophie using Promo code TLDTODAY -  Some of my favorite tech / gadgets that made my iPhone XS better. Perfect for iPhone XR as well!   Spotify Playlist!   V-Moda Lightning DAC -  Focal Listen Headphones -  Bang & Olufsen A1 Bluetooth Speaker -  Bang & Olufsen Blue -  Zoom iQ6 Lightning Microphone -   Instagram:  Twitter: http:/   50 Gadgets Under $50   TLD Behind the Scenes!  Mobile users:   Music via Musicbed:   My Audio Setup & Gear:
